summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to continue with South Lake Union Park - Wharf Development Project as contemplated in the 2001-2006 Capital Improvement Program; accepting a donation from the Kreielsheimer Foundation for the construction of the wharf at South Lake Union; establishing the South Lake Union Wharf Development Trust Subfund in the Parks and Recreation Fund and appropriating funds transferred into the same.
